description: From Latin gratus (“pleasing, agreeable”) + -ful, morphologically grate +‎ -ful.

adjectives.description: grateful (comparative gratefuller or more grateful, superlative gratefullest or most grateful)

examples: I'm grateful that you helped me out.
I'm grateful to you for helping me out.
[…]  its glands give forth gum arabic; and its flowers an odour of a very grateful fragrance.
